DOC.criteria: Confirmed pregnancy Caucasian/White AfricanAmerican ethnicity Between age 18 35 year Overweight become pregnant ( BMI=25.029.9 kg/m2 ) Pass glucose tolerance test diabetes Have 5 child Have history high blood pressure , high blood lipid , kidney liver disease Have inability handle blood sugar normally Have polycystic ovary syndrome Have thyroid disorder Have multiple fetus , pregnancy relate complication ( preterm labor ; diagnose gestational diabetes mellitus , pregnancy impair glucose tolerance , preeclampsia , first degree relative diabetes , give birth previous large gestational age infanthigh blood pressure , premature rupture membrane ) Have smoke past 6 month Have pregnant lactating ( breastfeed ) past year Do want baby 's body fat measure throughout first year life Do bring prenatal record study information copy Woman 's Hospital delivery Deliver hospital Woman 's Hospital Test positive human immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) , syphilis , sepsis , group B streptococcus , Hepatitis B Do follow study procedure Planning bank cord blood unwilling donate cord blood Planned/elective Csection .
